heroSection: A Professor and HOD - Data Science in a reputed Educational Institution, Dedicated to advancing the field of AI through innovative research, a focus on practical applications, and a commitment to excellence. Specializes in AI and ML with a focus on Deep Learning and Natural Language Processing. Accomplished author and researcher with multiple National and International patents.
profileSection: I am Dr. Sreenivasulu Gogula, an accomplished Professor and Head of the Department of CSE (Data Science) at Vardhaman College of Engineering, Hyderabad. With a Doctoral degree from JNTUH and a focus on Deep learning and Natural Language Processing, I am a renowned author and researcher in the field of Machine Learning and Deep Learning. I have filed more than 10 National patents and been granted 3 International Australian Patents, demonstrating my commitment to innovation and excellence.

education.degree: Pursuing Postdoc at Singapore Institute of Technology (SIT), Singapore
Postgraduate Diploma in Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning
education.timeSpan: 2022 at University of Hyderabad (UoH), in Association with Applied Roots Pvt Ltd., Hyderabad
